product_name: Picnic At Ascot 4 Person Picnic Backpack with Blanket
long_description: For your next gourmet picnic off the beaten track, invite your 3 favorite foodies and bring along the fully equipped 4-Person Picnic Backpack with Blanket from Picnic at Ascot. Sturdy polyester-canvas backpack has padded shoulder straps and a secure place inside for everything you need; stands upright on its own. Main compartment is insulated to keep food and drinks cool. On one exterior side, an insulated bottle carrier detaches for convenience. On the other side is a rolled-up 50 x 60 in. acrylic-fleece blanket with carrier. Inside the fold-down front compartment are 4 each of acrylic wine glasses, melamine plates, stainless-steel 3-piece flatware sets (knife, fork and spoon) and cloth napkins. You'll also find a small hardwood cutting board, cheese knife and wooden salt-and-pepper shakers with non-spill tops. A wooden-handled stainless-steel corkscrew/bottle opener/knife is also included. Pockets on the 4-Person Picnic Backpack with Blanket from Picnic at Ascot let you bring your own little extras.
short_description: For your next gourmet picnic off the beaten track, invite your 3 favorite foodies and bring along the fully equipped 4-Person Picnic Backpack with Blanket from Picnic at Ascot.
